description.english: The first step towards becoming a device doctor.

description.english: Identify all issues in a device flawlessly.
description.german: Identifiziere alle Probleme in einem Gerät fehlerfrei.
description.french: Identifiez tous les problèmes d'un appareil sans faille.
description.italian: Identifica tutti i problemi in un dispositivo senza errori.

description.tchinese: 完美地識別裝置中的所有問題

description.danish: Identificer alle fejl i en enhed uden fejl.
description.dutch: Identificeer foutloos alle problemen in een apparaat.
description.norwegian: Identifiser alle problemene i en enhet feilfritt.
description.swedish: Identifiera alla problem i en enhet utan misstag.
description.hungarian: Azonosítsd a készülék összes problémáját hiba nélkül.
description.romanian: Identificați toate problemele unui dispozitiv fără greșeală.
description.turkish: Bir cihazdaki tüm hataları eksiksiz tespit et.
description.brazilian: Identifique todos os problemas de um dispositivo sem erros.
description.bulgarian: Идентифицирай всички проблеми на устройство без грешка.
description.greek: Εντόπισε όλα τα προβλήματα σε μια συσκευή χωρίς λάθη.
description.ukrainian: Ідентифікуйте всі проблеми пристрою без помилок.
description.vietnamese: Xác định tất cả vấn đề của thiết bị mà không có lỗi.
description.latam: Identifica todos los problemas de un dispositivo sin errores.
description.indonesian: Identifikasi semua masalah pada perangkat tanpa kesalahan.
